titles.title: I will lift my voice to the Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will lift my voice to the Lord, I will cry, I will cry
I will lift my voice to the Lord, I will cry, I will cry

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will lift my voice to the Lord, I will plead, I will plead
I will lift my voice to the Lord, I will plead

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I will pour out, pour out
Pour out my complaint before him
I will pour out, pour out
Pour out my complaint before him

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I will lift my voice to the Lord, I will cry, I will cry
I will lift my voice to the Lord, I will cry, I will cry

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I will lift my voice to the Lord, I will plead, I will plead
I will lift my voice to the Lord, I will plead

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
I will pour out, pour out
Pour out my complaint before him
I will pour out, pour out
Pour out my complaint before him

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
I will tell of my woes before him
I will tell of my woes before him

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
I will tell of my woes before him
I will tell of my woes before him

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
Praise, o my soul, Praise the Lord
Praise, o my soul, Praise the Lord

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
Praise, o my soul, Praise the Lord
Praise, o my soul, Praise the Lord
